# [Interview #36: Twitter 2011 (WoT), Entry #107](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=36#107)

#### [Jarrette Marley (28 February 2011)](http://twitter.com/jabizzleshizzlr/status/42409153439875072)

Is the situation with the Black Tower addressed/resolved in the final WoT book?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (28 February 2011)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/42694244305080320)

RAFO. :)
